name: Nothing Does Matter
description:
Nothing does matter

...is a top down puzzle game where you literally play as N O T H I N G.

Controls
  • N O T H I G to take control of letters
  • arrows or WASD to move the letters
  • if somehow you softlock the game, R+E will restart level
  • + and - can adjust speed of a level in case you are having trouble

Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 45 compo :

  • game designed with GameMaker
  • music made with OpenMpt
  • Sounds generated with SFXR
